# Banana List

> Simple, delightful grocery list app for iOS with iCloud sync and a playful design.

For comprehensive information, see: [llms-full.txt](https://941getbananas.com/llms-full.txt)

## About

Banana List is a straightforward grocery list app that makes shopping simple and fun. Create lists, share with family, and never forget the bananas again.

## Key Features

- Quick item entry with smart suggestions
- iCloud sync across all your devices
- Share lists with family and friends
- Organize items by category
- Check off items as you shop
- Playful, delightful design
- Widget support for quick access

## App Details

- **Platform**: iOS / iPadOS
- **Developer**: 941 Apps, LLC
- **Website**: https://941getbananas.com

## Why "Banana List"?

Because everyone forgets the bananas. This app makes sure you don't.

## Contact

- Website: https://941getbananas.com
- Support: https://941getbananas.com/support
- Developer: 941 Apps, LLC
